snippet.title: Cargo Demo: Starting a New Game
snippet.description:
Cargo is a 3D adventure game about a snail being developed by a small indie team. New features in this demo:
 - Menu and saved games
 - Music
 - Dynamic grass
 - Speed powerups
 - Character animation and dialogue
 - HUD map and artificial horizon

4.5 years in the making, but still a work in progress. The final game should be ready around the start of 2013.

Made in Blender.
